properties.name: mainMonitorPpi
properties.description: The value of the system reported main monitor resolution

properties.name: applicationBarShown
properties.description: If true, application bar is shown.

properties.name: isValid
properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

properties.name: parent
properties.description: The parent of the GeneralPreference (a Application).

properties.name: events
properties.description: A collection of events.

properties.name: eventListeners
properties.description: A collection of event listeners.

properties.name: toolTips
properties.description: Tool tip behavior.

properties.name: showContentGrabber
properties.description: Controls whether or not the content grabber adornment is shown.

properties.name: showLiveCorners
properties.description: Controls whether or not the live corners grabber adornment is shown.

properties.name: showMasterPageOverlay
properties.description: Controls whether or not to show the master page overlay when a page is selected using the Page Tool.

properties.name: objectsMoveWithPage
properties.description: Controls whether page items move when a page is repositioned from the UI. The option/alt key temporarily reverses this property

properties.name: preventSelectingLockedItems
properties.description: Controls whether or not you can select and interact with a locked item. When this is off, only position is locked.

properties.name: enableMultiTouchGestures
properties.description: Controls whether or not multi-touch gestures are enabled.

properties.name: showAnchorObjectAdornment
properties.description: Controls whether or not the anchor object adornment is shown.

properties.name: highlightObjectUnderSelectionTool
properties.description: Controls whether or not to highlight object under selection tool.

properties.name: greekVectorGraphicsOnDrag
properties.description: Controls whether or not to greek vector graphics when dragging at high quality.

properties.name: showConveyor
properties.description: Show the conveyor on content collector or content placer tool activation

properties.name: createLinksOnContentPlace
properties.description: Enable the creation of links on content place

properties.name: mapStylesOnContentPlace
properties.description: Enable the mapping of styles on content place

properties.name: useCustomMonitorResolution
properties.description: Enable the use of a custom monitor resolution in pixels per inch as opposed to querying the system settings

properties.name: customMonitorPpi
properties.description: When using a custom monitor resolution, what is the value of that resolution in pixels per inch

properties.name: uiBrightnessPreference
properties.description: Specify the Application User Interface brightness preference (from 0.0 to 1.0). To use color theme brightness preset values, specify 0.0 for Dark, 0.50 for Medium Dark, 0.51 for Medium Bright, and 1.0 for Bright. Any value between 0.0 and 1.0 will automatically be mapped to closest preset.

properties.name: pasteboardColorPreference
properties.description: Specify the Pasteboard color preference (0 or 1). Specify 0 to set preference to Default White, and 1 to set preference to Match with Theme Color.

properties.name: showWhatsNewOnStartup
properties.description: If true, show What's New dialog on startup.

properties.name: autoAddSwatchToCCLibraries
properties.description: If true, on creating new swatch through the new swatch dialog, it will be exported to CC Libraries as well

properties.name: autoAddCharStyleToCCLibraries
properties.description: If true, on creating new char style through the new char style dialog, it will be exported to CC Libraries as well

properties.name: autoAddParaStyleToCCLibraries
properties.description: If true, on creating new para style through the new para style dialog, it will be exported to CC Libraries as well

properties.name: enablePublishOnline
properties.description: If true, enable publish online feature.

properties.name: showStartWorkspace
properties.description: If true, show start workspace when no documents are open

properties.name: showStockPurchaseAdornment
properties.description: If true, show stock cart adornment on unlicensed stock images

properties.name: toolsPanel
properties.description: Controls the appearance of the Tools panel.

properties.name: autoCollapseIconPanels
properties.description: If true, panel drawers close automatically.

properties.name: placeCursorUsesThumbnails
properties.description: Controls whether or not to show thumbnails of imported files in the Place icon.

properties.name: panelTabHeightPreference
properties.description: If true, Large Tabs are shown for panels else Smaller tabs are shown

properties.name: showLegacyNewDocumentDialog
properties.description: If true, legacy new document dialog will be shown when Ctrl/Cmd + N are pressed.

properties.name: autoShowHiddenPanels
properties.description: If true, vertical reveal strips appear when palette UI is hidden.

properties.name: useApplicationFrame
properties.description: If true, application lives in a frame.

properties.name: openDocumentsAsTabs
properties.description: If true, documents open as tabs.

properties.name: enableFloatingWindowDocking
properties.description: If true, floating windows can be docked by user as tabs.

properties.name: openRecentLength
properties.description: Number of items to show in the Open Recent menu list. Range: 0 to 30

properties.name: showTransformationValues
properties.description: Controls whether or not to dynamically display transformation information as part of the cursor while manipulating page items.

properties.name: temporaryFolder
properties.description: The location in which to store temporary files.

properties.name: pageNumbering
properties.description: The page numbering method.

properties.name: completeFontDownloadGlyphLimit
properties.description: The threshold at which to trigger font subsetting based on the number of glyphs the font contains.

properties.name: includePreview
properties.description: If true, includes a preview in saved documents.

properties.name: enableContentAwareFit
properties.description: If true, enable content-aware fit as default while placing items

properties.name: previewPages
properties.description: The pages to create preview images for. Note: Valid when include preview is true.

properties.name: useIncomingSpotUponConflict
properties.description: If true, use incoming spot color definition in case of conflict, when placing or pasting content

properties.name: ungroupRemembersLayers
properties.description: If true, objects after ungrouping go back to their original layers.

properties.name: previewSize
properties.description: The preview size. Note: Valid when include preview is true.

properties.name: properties
properties.description: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

methods.name: toSource
methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the GeneralPreference.

methods.name: getElements
methods.description: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.description: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.description: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
